dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4618 IH: Supporting Commercial Fishing in Port Infrastructure Projects Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Hoyle of Oregon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to allow Port Infrastructure Development Program grants to support the loading and unloading of commercially harvested fish and fish products, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Supporting Commercial Fishing in Port Infrastructure Projects Act.

section.header: Port infrastructure development program eligible projects
section.text: Section 54301(a)(3)(A)(ii) of title 46, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subclause (III) by striking ; or and inserting a semicolon;
in subclause (IV)(ii) by striking the period and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: port infrastructure that supports the loading and unloading of commercially harvested fish and fish products.
